Trade/Device Name(s): Neonatal Bilirubin (nBili) on Rapidlab 1200 Blood Gas Systems
Neonatal Bilirubin (nBili) on Rapidlab models 1245 and 1265
Regulation Name(s): Bilirubin (total and unbound) in the neonate test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Neonatal Bilirubin (nBili) test on Rapidlab 1245/1265 analyzers for determining neonatal bilirubin in whole blood using spectrophotometry.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test on Rapidlab 1245 and 1265 analyzers for determining total neonatal bilirubin concentration in whole blood of newborn infants; aids in assessing the risk of kernicterus.
